_a-0000e6c8-d132-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord

_a-0000ed77-8e71-8000-9df8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CEDM_constructLogMap
_a-0000ed77-8e71-8000-9df8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!map(
  timestamp: now(),
  uuid: ri!uuid,
  name: ri!name,
  logMessage: ri!logMessage,
  logLevel: a!defaultValue(value: ri!logLevel, default: "INFO")
)

_a-0000ec75-2131-8000-9da0-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CEDM_QR_getTransferRequestDetails
_a-0000ec75-2131-8000-9da0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  sort: ri!sort,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  recordType: recordType!AS GCM CEDM Transfer Request,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!requestType)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM CEDM Transfer Request.requestType,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!requestType
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM CEDM Transfer Request.documentId,
      operator: "not null",
      applyWhen: ri!returnOnlyActiveDocuments
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  fields: ri!fields
)

0002ec79-08a0-8000-b603-7f0000014e7a.name: AS GCM CEDM Document Management

_a-0000ed77-8e71-8000-9df8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CEDM_getTransferRequestsForDocDelete
